𒐍 USSUmen 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 о́сем ósem

八 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 аң-мең “beast”
八 𓏠 𓈖 •acht-many 8 ⋍ 𐌚 Etruscan Letter "PH"
٨ 𓏠 𓈖 thamaaniya ثامنية 8 = 24 zwei-mal-vier
𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 •samania (originally 𓋴 ⋍ ǧ ⇔ ox octo 8 )
𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 𒐍 ስምንት semment ሰማንቱ sämantu ሰማኒ sämani ፰ 8 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 𒐍 USSU(min) 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 ( 2 * 4 ) 𒐍 DIŠ.min 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 𒐍 שְׁמוֹנֶה shmóne שְׁמוֹנָה shmoná 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 𒐍 #samne šamānet @ Akkadian 𒈫·𒐋 0…7 𒅓 ≈ #8 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 •busamania восьмой bos'moyn bosmonia (past moon)

seven 0…7 => 1…8

𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 𒅓 ˢimin sibem sambe 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 seminate vs sect 𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓏲 𓌪 vs split

🕷 (8-leg) עַכָּבִישׁ akavísh ἀράχνη arákhnē aragne arachno 🕷 (8-leg) armiarmaⁿ merimangã 𓏱 murgañu damang ñandu мияма miyama möýᵒⁿ 🕷 แมงมุม mɛɛng-mum <> 八 𓏠 𓈖 <> 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 Spinne spiel spinning “spider”

Since 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 is so strongly associated with 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 the deep semantic relationship of 𓋴 𓏠 𓈖 is probably 24 or 42, since 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 mammals only have four legs.

What does a beast 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 ᴽ have to do with number 8 in a pantheon context?
Maybe it was the 8th cosmic entitiy after the 5 known planets plus sun and moon.
But what was it? 𒀯 MUL Milkyway? 𒀯 MUL Multitude of starry sky? 𒀯𒀯 Zodiac of 7 pleiades ? (7 is 8th digit starting from 0) but visually only 6 (plus doubling)!?

Note that 5 planets and stars 𓃀 𓇼 were similar concepts before modern science.

𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 spider compatibility is probably coincidental, or is it:

𒀯𒄈𒋰 Zuqaqīpu Scorpio •S-GÍR-PU (sic!)
